Profiles¶

Profiles control the operation of LavaStorm, each profile contains a model of

Base Load Profile¶

class lavaStorm.BaseLoadProfile[source]¶

The baseload profile maintains a steady run of jobs for a specific user. If the baseload is 5, then a total of 5 active jobs (Active jobs are defined as jobs that are either Pending or Running. As jobs exit, new jobs are submitted after a grace period of observation_time seconds.

Use this profile when you want to maintain a current load on the cluster over a period of time.

SubmitBatch Profile¶

class lavaStorm.SubmitBatchProfile[source]¶

The SubmitBatch profile submits a large number of jobs all at once, then waits for them to complete. After a some observation time period, another batch is submitted, and the process repeats.

No new jobs are submitted, until all the previous jobs have exited.

Use this profile when you want to create a peak in demand.
